para: There are a billion variants of Comma Separated Value data. This is the one that makes Delorme S&A Deluxe 9 happy. It's also a very simple program and useful for many other programs like spreadsheets.
CSV is also the correct format for Lowrance MapCreate, their commercial mapping program, or GDM6 (their free waypoint manager) for iFinder which is available at lowrance.com
